## Setup

Installing austraits.build package

```{r}
remotes::install_github("traitecoevo/austraits.build@seperate_definitions")
```

Install remake?

## building dataset

Update the build

```{r}
library(austraits.build)

austraits.build::setup_build_process()

ausinverts <- remake::make("austraits_raw")
```
